productSchema.attribute: Specifies the Id of the next generation server that the server is being upgraded to.
Specifies the encrypted root password for a slice.
Specifies whether the slice is managed.
Specifies the image Id for the slice.
Specifies the options for the slice, which are used for billing purposes.
Specifies the server Id for the slice. This is the host Id.

attribute.name: action
attribute.allowedValues: ADD_IP RESIZE REBOOT PASSWORD_RESET_DONE ADD_ALTERNATE_IP RENAME KERNEL_UP_TO_DATE HARD_REBOOT DELETE_IP BUILD DESTROY ADD_IP_NO_CONFIG DELETE_IP_NO_CONFIG KERNEL_UPDATE_FAILED UPGRADE_DEVICE_SERVICE_LEVEL DOWNGRADE_DEVICE_SERVICE_LEVEL

productSchema.attribute: Specifies the action that caused this event to be created.
Specifies the name of the image.
Specifies the customer Id for the slice. This value may be the same as the tenantId or may be the internal nucleus customer_id.
Specifies the flavor Id for the slice.

attribute.name: status
attribute.allowedValues: BUILD ACTIVE DELETED QUEUE_RESIZE PREP_RESIZE RESIZE VERIFY_RESIZE QUEUE_MOVE PREP_MOVE MOVE VERIFY_MOVE ERROR ERROR_ASYNC RESCUE SUSPENDED PENDING MAINTENANCE CLONE

productSchema.attribute: Specifies the slice type. Note: This value was used when there were Slicehost and Rackspace customers; now all customers are Rackspace and sliceType is always 'CLOUD'.
Specifies the private IP of the slice.
Specifies the public IP of the slice.
Specifies the dns1 value for the slice.
Specifies the dns2 value for the slice.
Specifies the date the slice was created.

attributeGroup.name: sliceMetaData
attributeGroup.description: Specifies a list of key/value meta data.

attributeGroup.name: additionalPublicAddress
attributeGroup.description: Specifies a list of public addresses.
